Quickstrike:




Quickstrike stood up. His eyes were locked on Shredder, and they never 
strayed. He stomped his foot on the floor of the room.

"Then get away from me and stop draggin' me around! Ya keep yer distance and 
ya won't get slagged! Hear me? Keep yer claws off me!"
